features: SYMMETRICAL SHAPE: No “right side up” silicone pacifier for babies are fuss-free and won’t need to be adjusted to sit properly in baby’s mouth and fits perfectly under nose for easy breathing.
SILICONE NIPPLE: The BPA-free silicone boy and girl pacifier has the signature MAM design, with silky SkinSoft material and a symmetrical shape that's ideal for jaw and teeth development.
SELF - STERILIZING CASE: Add water and pop into the microwave to sterilize MAM silicone pacifiers 6+ months in just 3 minutes and store in case for at home and travel to protect the pacifiers.
VENTILATED & COMFORTABLE SHIELD: These cute pacifiers for babies have a curved sterilizing shield with openings to keep baby comfortable, prevent moisture build-up, and allow baby’s skin to breathe.

HIGH QUALITY: Approved by 94% of babies*, our 100% BPA & BPS free silicone pacifiers meet or exceed US safety standards and are extremely durable while being soft and flexible for your baby's comfort.
body.description: The MAM Original Matte Pacifier was developed by leading pediatric dentists and developmental psychologists to provide maximum comfort and style for babies 6+ months of age.* MAM pacifiers for baby feature an innovative nipple designed to promote healthy oral development and with the help of a built-in air channel, the pacifier naturally flattens and extends when sucked, mimicking a human nipple during breastfeeding. All MAM pacifiers are orthodontic, featuring a symmetrical nipple that fits perfectly in baby's mouth at any angle and life-like, SkinSoft textured silicone that feels more natural, just like mom. With multiple pacifier shapes and shield sizes to pick from, MAM nipples are easily accepted by babies of all ages, with 94% nipple acceptance among babies tested.** Our Original plain pacifier comes in a variety of neutral matte colors to coordinate with your babies' everyday outfits! Pacifiers kept in the closed box will remain clean for up to 48 hours: Fill pacifier case with water. Place pacifier in the self-sterilizing case with the nipple facing down. Follow package instructions for microwave setting. Cool completely before use. *Developed with the International Children's Medical Research Society. ***Market research 2010-2020, tested with 1,572 babies

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Parenting is hard. We make stuff to make it easier. MAM knows that being a parent is not always easy, so we make products that are smart and simple to use. For over 45 years we've been obsessed with making innovative pacifiers, bottles, cups, teethers, and toothbrushes, providing babies with optimal care at all stages. MAM Original Matte Pacifier 2 Original Matte Pacifiers with Sterilizing Case MAM's BPA/BPS-free Original Pacifiers have been developed by leading pediatric dentists and developmental psychologists to provide maximum comfort and style for babies ages 6+ months*. MAM’s cutting-edge pacifiers combine technological innovation and trendsetting design to help give babies a healthy start in life. *Developed in conjunction with the International Children’s Medical Research Society Same beloved MAM Pacifiers, with a modern Matte finish and neutral colors & designs! SkinSoft silicone nipple feels soft and familiar like mom Anti-slip texture helps nipple stay comfortably in baby’s mouth Curved shield allows the pacifier to sit comfortably on baby’s face Shield openings allow air to circulate and baby’s skin to breathe

Air holes in shield allow baby's skin to breathe Symmetrical nipple promotes healthy oral development by reducing pressure on incoming teeth SkinSoft silicone nipple offers a familiar feel Self sterilizing case sterilizes in the microwave in just 3 minutes

MAM Perfect Pacifier MAM Perfect Night Pacifier MAM Air Pacifier MAM Original Matte Pacifier MAM Original Pacifiers 6+ Nipple Size ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ SkinSoft Textured Silicone Nipple ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Textured Shield (Reduces Skin Irritation) ✓ ✓ Extra Air Exposure (For Sensitive Skin) ✓ Extra Thin & Flexible Orthodontic Nipple ✓ ✓ Quantity 2 2 2 2 3 Includes Self-Sterilizing Box ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Glows in the Dark ✓ 1 of 3

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love these brand of pacifiers. They don’t make the teeth grow in crooked. Durable, quality great, cute designs, easy to sterilize.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not for newborns
reviews.reviewText: I got these thinking they would be the smallest size in MAM but they are the 6 months+. Super cute and otherwise perfect but too big for my little one currently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommended by Pediatrician
reviews.reviewText: These are for my 6 month and 9 month old grand babies. They seem to have no issues with them. Sterilizing a breeze and colors are good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only paci my baby will take!
reviews.reviewText: We originally bought these for their neutral color options but these pacifiers quickly became the only ones my baby would take. 1.5 years and 16+ purchases later we are still buying this brand. Easy to clean and goes with most of her outfits!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our sons favorite!
reviews.reviewText: We love the mam pacis! They are BPA and and BPS free, they come in a sterilizer box, and this paci really does soothe our baby! We have tried so many and this has been the best one for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter only likes these kind of pacifier. Beautiful colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Only pacifier my baby will take. We started with the MAM 0-6. I’m not really sure why there are different sizes but when I realized we needed more because some of ours had disappeared I bought these ones that say 6 and up. They do look a little different but still unsure why or what the purpose is behind the ages. Either way they work great, they are easy to clean and baby loves them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pacifier for BF Baby
reviews.reviewText: Theses are the first and only pacifiers my BF babe has taken in months of trying. The fit is easy for him to latch onto and keep in his mouth comfortably. In addition, I like that the colors are neutral and more muted than other pacifiers I’ve seen. I will be buying more of these for my baby.
